decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on submitted plan numbers 00P005 Rev A, 00P010 Rev A, 00P110 Rev C, 00P120 Rev B and 00P020 Rev A and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions Hillingdon Local Plan Parts 1 (November 2012) and 2 (January 2020) and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendments hereby approved, other than drawing no.s 00P110 Rev A and 00P120 Rev A associated with condition 2, which are superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission ref: 3231/APP/2023/1083 dated 06-06-23 must be adhered to as per that permission and any other associated discharge of condition application which has been approved.
description: Non-material amendment to planning application ref 3231/APP/2023/1083 dated 06-06-2023 (Erection of single storey extension to the rear of 84A Long Lane to be used as day centre for care home) to make revisions to the ground floor layout.
